thisIsYourSecretRecoveryPhrase: This is your Secret Recovery Phrase. Write it down on a piece of paper and store in a safe place. You’ll be asked to re-enterthis phrase (in order) in the next step
lastStep: Last step! Please select each phrase in order to make sure it is correct.
welcomeContent: Cloudmet helps you connect to the decenterlized web wherever you go. Get started today, easy to send files to family, friends, and co-workers by import your existing wallet or create a new one!
importYourWalletWithSecret: Import your wallet from private key
secureYourWalletListText1: Write down your Secret Recovery Phrase on a piece of paper and store in a safe place
secureYourWalletListText2: Make sure no one is watching your screen
congretulationsContentText: You’ve successfully protected your wallet. Remember to keep your Secret Recovery Phrase safe, it’s your responsibility!
